dependencyPatterns.message: This is a sample dependencyPattern file. All the dependencies of the project will be checked against the regular expression defined in <group>, <name> and <version>. Note that the dependencyPattern will be checked if all the <group>,<name> and <version> matches the patterns. The severity can take values ERROR, WARN and INFO and the message to go with the severity can be defined in the <message>
dependencyPatterns.versionPattern: version of all dependencies will be checked against this pattern
dependencyPatterns.namePattern: name of all dependencies will be checked against this pattern
dependencyPatterns.groupPattern: group of all dependencies will be checked against this pattern
